statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name, sale_amount, customer_id FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND sale_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name ASC, sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 3 ORDER BY total_sales DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData JOIN InventoryData ON SalesData.product_name = InventoryData.product_name;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount < 5000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM InventoryData WHERE current_quantity <= 50 ORDER BY current_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryData WHERE last_inventory_update > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_inventory_update DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity < 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_name, available_quantity, last_updated FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 50 AND sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY units_in_stock DESC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM SalesTrends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock, last_restock_date FROM Inventory WHERE units_in_stock < 10;
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date FROM SalesAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock, last_restock_date FROM Inventory WHERE units_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE available_quantity < reorder_level;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, products.product_name, sale_date FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, sales.sale_amount, inventory.available_quantity FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 2;
